name: In The Dark (itch) (theblindguy31)
description:
My "first" official game. 

In the Dark is a horror exploration game with a focus on audio design. Players are dropped into a maze where several types of monsters living in. They then can only utilize the audio cues released by the monsters to deduce the location of the various monsters. Using that information, players should avoid the ghosts while navigate towards the exit in order to escape from the maze. 

For now it's a primitive game with some test concepts that I might polish in the future.
